ugtm.ugtm_gtm¶

Functions to run GTM models.

Functions

initialize(data, k, m, s[, random_state]) Initializes a GTM model.
optimize(data, initialModel, regul, niter[, …]) Optimizes a GTM model.
projection(optimizedModel, new_data) Project test set on optimized GTM model.
runGTM(data[, k, m, s, regul, doPCA, …]) Run GTM (wrapper for initialize + optimize).
transform(optimizedModel, train, test[, …]) Preprocess and project test set on optimized GTM model.
